item.description:
@glennnn8 wrote:

Hi there,
I wanna know where i need to add this code

Add these voids above any other voidâ€¦

public boolean filterName() { String[] list = {"vagina", "fuck", "shit", "damn", "bitch"}; for (int i = 0; i < list.length; i++) if (playerName.toLowerCase().indexOf(list[i]) != -1) return true; return false; } public void giveTheBanHammer() { if(filterName() == true) appendToBanned(playerName); else sendMessage("Your name if clear of profanity!"); }
Iam using the evilscape sourch,
Already thanks for any help

Glenn,
